title: New: MORLY – Seraphese
content:
This debut track from Minneapolis’s MORLY feels halfway between a stroll through an uber cool Berlin club, and a school piano recital.

Pulsating beautifully, it’s strikingly minimal, yet deeply intriguing, and as Disco Naiveté points out, it really feels like the start of something.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
